options.command: pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/router-demo/router-host-2000/cypress.config.ts --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser chrome

development.command: pnpm exec cypress open --config-file apps/router-demo/router-host-2000/cypress.config.ts --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser electron

ci.command: pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/router-demo/router-host-2000/cypress.config.ts --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:2000 --browser chrome

commands.command: pnpm exec wait-on tcp:2000 && NX_TUI=false nx run router-host-2000:e2e --configuration=ci
